mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Orders (custid, bookid, saleprice, orderdate, quantity) VALUES (#{custid}, #{bookid}, #{saleprice}, #{orderdate}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT b.bookname, b.price, o.orderdate FROM orders o JOIN book b ON o.bookid = b.bookid WHERE o.custid = ( SELECT u.username FROM users u WHERE u.name = #{name} )
